What You Can Configure in Templates

Templates contain settings related to the following areas of the chart:

l Content and layout of the Demographics and Patient Summary modules.

Demographics

Patient Summary

l Required data for every case.

Configure a Demographics section

Configure required functional types and clinical priorities

l Preferences for application behavior when opening and closing the application, and starting and ending patient sessions.

Starting and Ending Sessions

l Ability of users to edit and delete different types of data.

Preferences for Real-Time Data

l Custom flowsheets.

Flowsheets

l Format of the Fluid Balance window.

Fluid Balance Window

l Printouts.

Printouts

l Available features, accessories and add-ins in the application.

Add-Ins

Timers

l Configuration of the toolbar, Vital Signs bar and Patient Information Band.

Patient Information Band

Vital Signs Bar

Menu Commands and Toolbar Buttons

l Clinical content available to users for documenting patient care.

Protocols

Events

l Screen layouts and macros.

Configure a screen layout as an add-in

Configure a macro as an add-in
